channel.title: I don't really know what I'm doing lol
channel.description: Recent content on I don't really know what I'm doing lol

item.title: LG UltraFine 5k on Linux and Windows
item.description: This is yet another post about attempting to get the LG UltraFine 5k working on Linux/Windows. TLDR: It works at a 4k resolution over USB-c from my gpu. USB peripherals are not detected on Linux over Thunderbolt. Why are you doing this? The LG UltraFine 5k is a really gorgeous monitor that’s (unfortunately) a unique product in the market right now. There seems to be no other product with the following feature sets:

item.title: About
item.description: Just another software engineer blogging about Kubernetes, Jazz, and whatever else is going on. I don’t really know what I’m doing so take the content here as you will. If you find any errors or misinformation you can shoot me an email at skang0601@gmail.com but I make no guarantees.

item.title: My First blog post
item.description: This is my blog, I hope to post some useful information for other folks hacking at various things here and work on my writing skills. …There’s not much here yet, but look forward to some more content!
